climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging. U.S. EPA Safer Choice certified products contain safer ingredients for human health and the environment.

features: GENTLE: Our Hand Wash & Delicates detergent was specifically formulated for fine silks, wools, and hand wash only garments. Phytolase, our advanced enzyme cleaning technology targets stains and odors at their source while being extra gentle for you, your clothes, and the planet. Consciously built with nontoxic, biobased ingredients, our formulas are safe for sensitive skin and the environment.

EFFECTIVE: For us, dirty-free cleaning is not just about clean ingredients. We formulate to get the job done, and we put our products through rigorous testing to ensure they’re strong enough for those who like to get really dirty. Phytolase enzyme cleaning technology precision targets stains and odors instead of fabrics so you can wear your favorite outfits for longer.

ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY: The truth is, most cleaners today use technologies that were developed almost 100 years ago. In fact, many common deep-cleaning formulas still rely on harmful, petroleum-based chemicals. At Dirty Labs - Less is More. By creating hyper-concentrated formulas, we greatly reduce our package sizes (and thus, our carbon footprint). And our formulas are readily biodegradable and free of carcinogens, irritants, toxins, and pollutants commonly found in detergents today.

DIRECTIONS: Follow your garment care label and washing machine instructions. For handwash: use 8-12 ml in a sink or basin. For delicate machine wash: select gentle or delicate cycle and use cold water. Our detergent is hyper-concentrated use as follows: 8ml for medium loads, 12ml for large loads, 16 ml for x-large loads.

SPECS: 8.6 fl oz = 32 loads. Free & Clear (Scent Free). Compatible with traditional and HE washers. Optimized for cold water. Safe for sensitive skin and dermatologist tested. Recognized by the National Eczema Association (NEA). No sulfates, dyes, parabens, preservatives, chlorine bleach, or CA Prop.65 Chemicals. Visit our store for more ingredients information. Dirty Labs is cruelty-free, vegan, hypoallergenic, and safe for babies and pets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve recently begun purchasing more wool clothing. I was looking for a good detergent to use for them as well as other things(I use it to wash my Apple Watch bands, works great). This laundry detergent is one of the, if not the best I have used. For the most part I use Tide, but once I’m done with my current supply I’ll be switching over.The little dosing cup is a brilliant idea, and while I could see myself losing it, I appreciate it keeping the bottle and shelf clean from the usual drips of soap.As for the detergent itself, it does a great job cleaning my clothing. I don’t generally get clothing too dirty, so I can’t speak to how well it could handle that, but everything has been coming out clean. My clothes come out and feel genuinely clean and not like they’ve got stuff left in the fabric. I have sensitivities to cleaning products at times and don’t have any trouble with this. I wouldn’t call it scentless, it has a smell, but I find it inoffensive and it doesn’t stay with the clothes after washing.10/10 would recommend and will buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans well with no scent.
reviews.reviewText: I have recently began adding a lot of washable silk and washable wool into my wardrobe. I had been cleaning them with my regular laundry detergent on the delicate cycle prior to purchasing this product. For whatever reason it seemed the laundry detergent was not really cleaning the natural fibers very well. This particular product really got my wool sweaters, very clean and removed stinky under arm, sweat and deodorant debris easily without damaging the natural fibers. I also had really good success using this to wash my delicate bras and lingerie, and it did an excellent job, cleaning the high-quality microfiber and other delicate materials. I absolutely love that this does not have any scent. I Purchased, a very beautiful vintage, angora, rabbit, and wool blend sweater, and I washed it, and I just couldn’t believe how dirty it was, this product left my sweater so clean and fresh and fluffy, it really beautifully restored the vintage sweater to its glory. I would definitely purchase this product again. It is an excellent detergent for delicates and natural fibers. For best results, I air dried all of the items I washed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Hand Wash, Odd Scent
reviews.reviewText: I switched to this when the price of Soak went up, and I love that it comes with a measuring cup over the lid. I've been getting more washes out of it, which is good, because I do find it spendy still. It does have a bit of a strange scent to it, even though it's supposed to be fragrance free. I have a pretty sensitive nose, so most people may not notice it, and it's not really a bad scent. Just strange, like I said. Something to be aware of, if you're also sensitive to smells. Otherwise, I really like it so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No scent! All I'm smelling is clean :D
reviews.reviewText: I don't like my clothes to have a scent, it can be overwhelming to my senses sometimes. This is perfect because my clothes smell like nothing. only clean. I use a laundry sanitizer too, which leaves a really clean, subtle lysol smell that i actually like- so that's all my laundry smells like. i like that it's optimized for cold water too. not super sure what that means, but it reassures me that my laundry is getting as clean as possible even when i wash it on cold (so my clothes don't shrink)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like magic
reviews.reviewText: I was very sceptical, but in a few hours os soaking it made all the cooking stains disappear from my favourite tee shirt! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it doesn't leave scent.
reviews.reviewText: Works amazing and left cloths feeling great. My washer needs to be cleaned so has a smell. It was gone after each load which was awesome. Clothes looked great. And had no damage. I washed in deleacate wash bag

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I use it everyday
reviews.reviewText: Great product if you have itchy skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars What is that smell?
reviews.reviewText: I've never written a review before, but I felt compelled to...This detergent will make your stuff smell musty and sweaty.... like sweaty socks but not sour.I bought something made of wool for the first time and washed it with this... ended up smelling sweaty and like burnt hair. I thought it was the wool, so I returned it.Later I washed my existing blankets and they came out smelling REALLY weird and then I realized it was the detergent... bleh
